mapper.insert: INSERT INTO excercisebook( bookName, language, area, sharedType, createTime, createId, remark )VALUES( #{bookName}, #{language}, #{area}, #{sharedType}, #{createTime}, #{createId}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE excercisebook set bookName=#{bookName}, language=#{language}, sharedType=#{sharedType}, area=#{area}, remark=#{remark}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, updateId=#{updateId} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from excercisebook t where t.id=#{excerciseId}
